name: Chaotic Void
description:
Chaotic Void is a wacky local couch brawler game set in zero gravity space with unique physics gameplay, a multitude of crazy weapons, coldly inhospitable environments, and feisty space-themed characters. It’s brutal. It’s fun. It’s chaotic!Features:
  • 2 to 4 local players brawl it out in the chaotic void of space
    (NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE)
  • Unique physics driven gameplay mechanics
  • Tons of unique weapons and growing
  • Crazy hazardous environments
